Tip


I really appreciate active participation and interaction!

title: Tobias Vlćek
text:
Hi there! I’m Tobias, a researcher based at the University of Hamburg. My passion lies in using quantitative tools like applied optimization and simulation to tackle real-world problems – think improving public transport during major events or helping police plan their service areas more effectively.
Alongside my academic work, I’m the founder of BeyondSimulations and co-founder of decorum SOLAR, putting these analytical skills into practice in different ventures. I use programming tools like Julia and Python in my work and also enjoy teaching, sharing my course materials openly online.
Whether through research, my entrepreneurial work or teaching, my aim is to bridge the gap between academic methods and practical application, helping create better systems for everyone.

title: Lectures
text: Below you’ll find a collection of my open educational resources covering optimization, programming, and logistics. These courses combine theoretical foundations with practical applications, designed to help students and professionals apply quantitative methods to real-world problems.

title: Lectures
text:
Custom Training for Organizations
I also develop tailored training programs and workshops for companies and organizations. These specialized courses are designed to meet specific business needs and are not publicly available.
Contact me to discuss custom training opportunities.
